about.summary: Development headers and libraries for Clang

name: libclang
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: libclang
    version: 10.0.1
source:
    -   folder: .
        patches:
            - patches/0001-Find-conda-gcc-installation.patch
            - patches/0001-Set-VERSION-in-osx-as-well.patch
            - patches/0002-Fix-sysroot-detection-for-linux.patch
            - patches/0002-clang-add-conda-specific-env-var-CONDA_BUILD_SYSROOT.patch
            - patches/0003-clang-Fix-normalizeProgramName-s-handling-of-dots-ou.patch
            - patches/cross-compile.diff
        sha256: f99afc382b88e622c689b6d96cadfa6241ef55dca90e87fc170352e12ddb2b24
        url: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/releases/download/llvmorg-10.0.1/clang-10.0.1.src.tar.xz
    -   folder: tools/extra
        sha256: d093782bcfcd0c3f496b67a5c2c997ab4b85816b62a7dd5b27026634ccf5c11a
        url: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/releases/download/llvmorg-10.0.1/clang-tools-extra-10.0.1.src.tar.xz
build:
    number: 1
    string: default_hcf6a1e0_1
requirements:
    build:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.34 h2122c62_9
        - binutils_impl_linux-aarch64 2.34 hb77b82c_9
        - binutils_linux-aarch64 2.34 hfcdf779_27
        - bzip2 1.0.8 h516909a_2
        - c-ares 1.16.1 h516909a_0
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - cmake 3.18.0 h5c55442_0
        - expat 2.2.9 he1b5a44_2
        - gcc_impl_linux-64 7.5.0 hda68d29_13
        - gcc_impl_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 hf17dfc6_14
        - gcc_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 h6232204_27
        - gxx_impl_linux-64 7.5.0 h64c220c_13
        - gxx_impl_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 hb8fdc25_14
        - gxx_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 he3acab2_27
        - kernel-headers_linux-64 2.6.32 h77966d4_13
        - kernel-headers_linux-aarch64 4.18.0 hca5cc2b_10
        - krb5 1.17.1 hfafb76e_2
        - ld_impl_linux-64 2.34 hc38a660_9
        - ld_impl_linux-aarch64 2.34 h281f86e_9
        - libcurl 7.71.1 hcdd3856_4
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 h46ee950_1
        - libev 4.33 h516909a_0
        - libgcc-devel_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 h1a28f53_14
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h24d8f2e_14
        - libgomp 9.3.0 h24d8f2e_14
        - libllvm10 10.0.1 he513fc3_1
        - libnghttp2 1.41.0 hab1572f_1
        - libssh2 1.9.0 hab1572f_5
        - libstdcxx-devel_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 h96f9e0b_14
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 hdf63c60_14
        - libuv 1.38.0 h516909a_0
        - llvm-tools 10.0.1 he513fc3_1
        - llvmdev 10.0.1 he513fc3_1
        - make 4.3 h516909a_0
        - ncurses 6.2 he1b5a44_1
        - openssl 1.1.1g h516909a_1
        - rhash 1.3.6 h14c3975_1001
        - sysroot_linux-64 2.12 h77966d4_13
        - sysroot_linux-aarch64 2.17 h4744778_10
        - tk 8.6.10 hed695b0_0
        - xz 5.2.5 h516909a_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1006
    host:
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - clang 10.0.1 default_hcf6a1e0_1
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h8e86211_14
        - libgomp 9.3.0 h8e86211_14
        - libllvm10 10.0.1 h6bb024c_0
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 hca8aa85_14
        - llvm 10.0.1 0
        - llvm-tools 10.0.1 h6bb024c_0
        - llvmdev 10.0.1 h6bb024c_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1006
    run:
        - libgcc-ng >=7.5.0
        - libllvm10 >=10.0.1,<10.1.0a0
        - libstdcxx-ng >=7.5.0
test:
    commands:
        - test -f "$PREFIX/lib/libclang.so"
        - test -f "$PREFIX/lib/libclang.so.10"
about:
    home: http://llvm.org/
    license: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception
    license_family: Apache
    license_file: LICENSE.TXT
    summary: Development headers and libraries for Clang
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - SylvainCorlay
        - chrisburr
        - inducer
        - isuruf
        - jakirkham
        - timsnyder
